title: Kristen Stewart flaunts taut tummy in 'Hollyweed' crop-top after buying bouquet of sunflowers in LA
text:
Former child star Kristen Stewart sported a white 'Hollyweed' cropped T-shirt after buying a bouquet of sunflowers in Los Angeles on Friday.

The 29-year-old César Award winner's canvas lace-up shoes were so old and worn her big toe was busting out of one.

The JT LeRoy actress - who relies on stylist Tara Swennen - completed her attire with unflattering pleated khakis and a baseball cap over her bedhead bleached hair.

4/20: Former child star Kristen Stewart sported a white 'Hollyweed' cropped T-shirt after buying a bouquet of sunflowers in Los Angeles on Friday

It's unclear whether Kristen's flowers were a gift for her latest flame, Miss 2059 screenwriter Dylan Meyer, or her on/off girlfriend, Victoria's Secret Angel Stella Maxwell.

Stewart and the 29-year-old Lions Model rekindled their romance in June after an eight-month split.

The sapphic couple were first pictured partying together at the Met Gala way back in May 2016.

Girrrrl! The 29-year-old César Award winner's canvas lace-up shoes were so old and worn her big toe was busting out of one

Rolled out of bed: The JT LeRoy actress - who relies on stylist Tara Swennen - completed her attire with unflattering pleated khakis and a baseball cap over her bleached hair

The Interpol video vixen next plays Sabina Wilson opposite Naomi Scott and Ella Balinska in Elizabeth Banks' remake of Charlie's Angels, which hits US theaters November 15 and UK theaters November 29.

'My character is wily. I'm the really irresponsible older sister who takes care of these girls. Sabina would take a bullet for you but she never really knows what time it is or where she's supposed to be,' Kristen explained to Collider on Wednesday.

'There's this network of women across the globe who are connected and are really unstoppable. So it's not like there are these three unattainable women who can fly or do kung fu while suspended in the air. No, these girls are actually smart and it's about women who are friends and who are good people working together.'

On and off since 2016: It's unclear whether Kristen's flowers were a gift for her latest flame, Miss 2059 screenwriter Dylan Meyer, or her on/off girlfriend, Victoria's Secret Angel Stella Maxwell (pictured Tuesday)

Sapphic couple: Stewart and the 29-year-old Lions Model rekindled their romance in June after an eight-month split (pictured in 2018)

When asked if she stays in touch with her Twilight castmates, Stewart joked that they 'all have a group chat.'

'I run into people all the time. I can't make it to Taylor [Lautner]'s Halloween party, which bums me out, I'm going to be in New York,' the homeschooled millennial said.

'[My ex-boyfriend Robert Pattinson] is great, he's doing well, he's going to be Batman and I'm very proud of him. It's nice...We've all become real whole people who still know each other. I'm really thankful for that.'
description: The 29-year-old César Award winner's canvas lace-up shoes were so old and worn her big toe was busting out of one
